alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 02 at 9:09AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: .Heavy rainfall over the past week has elevated river levels on the Little Susitna River into bankfull conditions with lowland overflows in homes along the river near Houston. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The following area, Little Susitna River near Houston. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Homes near the river may see some lowland flooding which may impact basements or low areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 905 AM AKDT, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing and expected to continue into Sunday. - For Little Susitna at Houston: At 8:00am the stage was 9.63 feet. Flood Stage is 11.0 feet. Forecast: A crest around 11.2 feet is expected around 4:00pm Saturday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
